root.name: Code Name: Viper
root.description: StoryCommander Jones is briefing Mr. Smith about 7 hideouts of the huge drug syndicates in South America have been discovered, and that the mission is to destroy them all. On of the commandos has been hurt and captured in one of these 7 hideouts, Smith will also have to rescue him and retrieve the grenades that the commando has on him. Â
